title: WHY ISN'T LEAGUE OPENING
body: I press on my league icon and the league of legends logo shows up. Then, Immediately, it closes down again. How do i fix this?

replies.body:
Can you try launching it as admin? Simply right-click on the shortcut and select *run as administrator*.

Let me know if this worked! ^.^

Mine is having the same issue, I am uninstalling the program, and reinstalling it to see if it worked, or if my computer kan identify the issue. I suggest you do the same, but still, if you don't, i wish you the best.
I can open my LOL window but it's black and does nothing what do I do
I just restarted my computer and it worked xd it said we are working on an update and are restoring it to the old version something like that lol
It won't open for me either
